short_summary: Supply and delivery of Low Pressure Laminates (plastic laminate) and particle board to Correctional Services of Canada for CORCAN program.
description: Previous solicitation (21C11-231736/A) cancelled on January 13, 2028, new solicitation reallocates funds for Low Pressure Laminates and particle board.
tags: Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
full_summary:
================

### Government Tender Announcement: Request for Standing Offer (RFSO)

#### Tender Information

* **Title and Reference**: 21C11-231736-B: Low Pressure Laminates and Particle Boards (WS3823344777-Doc4143280120)
* **Amendment Number**: 10
* **Solicitation Number**: WS3823344777
* **Publication Date**: August 11, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: October 13, 2023 (2:00 PM EST)
* **Amendment Date**: October 6, 2023
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: March 26, 2024
* **Expected Contract End Date**: March 31, 2024

#### Procurement Details

* **Supply Category**: *Raw materials
* **Interior Laminates**: 
* **Furniture and Furnishings**:
* **Solicitation Type**: Request for Standing Offer (RFSO)
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Selection Criteria**: Variation or combination of above methods

#### Trade Agreements

* The tender is subject to the following trade agreements:  
  * Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
  * Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
  * Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
  * Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
  * Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
  * Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
  * Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
  * Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
  * World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
  * Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
  * Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)

#### Contracting Entity and End User

* **Contracting Entity Name and Address**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
  11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, QC K1A 0S5, Canada
* **End User Entity Name and Address**: Correctional Service of Canada (CSC)
  340 Laurier Ave W, Ottawa, ON K1P 0P9, Canada

#### Contact Information

* **Contact Name**: Ian Arboleda, SPAC/PSPC
* **Contact Email**: ian.arboleda
